short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically generate a suggested branch name and a suggested commit message for Jira issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Based on the currently logged-in user and the currently displayed issue in Jira, this extension will generate some suggested branch name and commit message.
